creator: Syretia
text:
### [The art of the command line](https://github.com/jlevy/the-art-of-command-line) (easy to follow command line guide) ### [codecademy](https://www.codecademy.com/learn/learn-the-command-line) ### [Linux Shell Scripting Tutorial (LSST) v2.0](https://bash.cyberciti.biz/guide/Main_Page) ### [tldp bash beginner guide](http://tldp.org/LDP/Bash-Beginners-Guide/html/index.html) ### [tldp bash advanced guide](http://www.tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/abs-guide.html) ### [Google script styling guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/shell.xml) ### [ShellCheck](https://shellcheck.net) (find bugs in your shell scripts) ### [Awesome Shell](https://github.com/alebcay/awesome-shell) (guides and tools) ### [SSH tutorial](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/ssh-essentials-working-with-ssh-servers-clients-and-keys)
*This entry needs to be expanded with information about alternative interactive shells.*
title: shell
caption: Shell Scritping and Command Line
